trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESSUM2016_00347_WUNTHYLL_000_000<tab>Well, if it ain't <var 29 EB02 /var>! You probably don't remember me, but suffice it to say, I remember you! Aye, I'll never forget the face of the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who helped me turn my life around! But enough of that!

TEXT_FESSUM2016_00347_WUNTHYLL_000_010<tab>It's around this area that people have been spottin' 'em Bombard buggers, so I brought my elbsts down here to assist adventurers and guild members lookin' to aid in the extermination of the fiery fiends. Lucky for you, eh?
TEXT_FESSUM2016_00347_WUNTHYLL_000_020<tab>She ain't to yer likin'? A right shame that is. Lemme see if I can't find you a better fit!
